Desc.entry: Acts as a lobbying group on local issues, holds public meetings of local concern, identifies the needs of the area, sources long-term funding in the area and develops an action plan for economic, social and community development. Co-ordinates both residents' and retailers' forums as well as holding open forum meetings on issues of general community interest. Open to local residents, voluntary, community and faith groups, local traders, businesses and local service providers. Home of Hillsborough in Bloom. Company limited by guarantee no S692159.

ContactName.entry: Nick Waterfield, Senior Project Development Officer/Wendy Wells, Environment Projects Officer

category.entry: COMMUNITY FORUMS AND LOCAL ACTION GROUPS
